metadata.title: CVE-2024-35829 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/lima: fix a memleak in lima_heap_alloc When lima_vm_map_bo fails, theresources need to be deallocated, or there will be memleaks.

criterions.comment: linux package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-hwe package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-kvm package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
